title: Power - work as a function of time

content.question: The work done on an object is described by the equation <math alttext="W equals, 3 times t squared plus 5 t, minus 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>âˆ’</mo><mn>1</mn></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="W" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>W</mi></math> is in joules and <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> is in seconds. What is the power delivered to the object at <math alttext="t equals 2.0 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="10.5 watts" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>10.5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math>
<math alttext="16.0 watts" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>16.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math>
<math alttext="17.0 watts" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>17.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math>
<math alttext="21.0 watts" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>21.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="17.0 watts" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>17.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
